= Link_BankData

//  auto generated content Thu, 06 Jul 2017 00:46:51 +0200
== Short description

Returns the URL to the page that contains your bank details. This page must have been set in the **System » Client » Select client » Online store » Pages** menu.

== Description of this function

[source,plenty]
----

Link_BankData() : string

----
